title: Dell security advisory (AV25-155)
description: Between March 17 and 23, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Dell APEX Cloud Platform for Red Hat OpenShift  versions prior to 03.01.02.00
Dell Chassis Management Controller (CMC) for Dell PowerEdge FX2  versions prior to 2.40.200.202101130302
Dell Chassis Management Controller (CMC) for PowerEdge VRTX  versions prior to 3.41.200.202209300499
Dell Data Protection Central  versions 19.9.0 to 19.11.0-2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
